questions.question: You are configuring network isolation for a SageMaker training job to prevent data leaks. What is a potential drawback of enabling network isolation?
options: The job will lose access to S3.
IAM roles cannot be assigned to the job.
The job cannot use VPC endpoints.
correct_answers: The job will lose access to S3.
